name: ceqsrexv2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wa(wcel(c1, c0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wa(wcel(c1, c0), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wa(wcel(c1, c0), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Alternate elimitation of a restricted existential quantifier, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Sep-2017.)
